title: "there was a problem patching league of legends" sudden client problems
body:
After i just finished a game (got stomped by 'master no skill' btw thank the guy who ever created that champion for me) and after the game i got "there was a problem patching league of legends. we'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart your patcher" errer and when i did the restart is says "we have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends. Now we'll try to patch it up tot he latest version." And i just keep restarting my client i get an endless loop of these two messages please help me.

Update: ive just logged in the problem seems to be fixed for me

replies.body:
I fixed mine like this.

Download the hextech repair tool, then check force repatch and press start. After that it should be fixed.

Hope this worked for you.
